entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Beaverlodge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaverlodge 12:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -16.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -19.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow at times mixed with freezing rain ending before morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:17 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning late in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:17 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:17 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
